description.en: SDEX is the token from the first DEX on the planet to fix Impermanent Loss. It is explained in a scientific paper here: https://www.academia.edu/98332701/The_SMARDEX_Protocol_A_Novel_Solution_to_Impermanent_Loss_in_Decentralized_Finance
